Package org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PageScrollView.ZoomChangeListener
    Interface for zoom change listeners.
    RegionPropertiesView.PropertiesViewClickListener
    Listener interface for special click events in the page content object properties view
    RegionTypeEditor.RegionTypeSelectionListener
    Listener for user selection of new region type.
    SelectionManager.SelectionListener
    Listener interface for selection change events
    TextContentView.TextContentViewChangeListener
    Listener for text change events (by user).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeEditor
    Editor for a single page content object attribute
    PageScrollView
    View for displaying and interacting with a document page.
    ReadingOrderTreeView  
    RegionPropertiesView
    Table view for page content object attributes.
    RegionPropertiesView.PropertiesViewVariableComparator
    Comparator for sorting page content object attributes in a predefined order
    RegionTypeEditor
    Editor to change region type (text, image, table, etc.)
    SelectionManager
    Manages page content object selection (selected objects, selection listeners).
    TextContentView
    Text box view for page content object text content.
